DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : It yet know regimen enteral nutrition effective preventing infection patient undergo surgery cancer upper aerodigestive tract . PURPOSE : This randomized phase III trial compare three nutrition regimen treat patient cancer upper aerodigestive tract .
DOC.brief_title: Study Nutrition Regimens Treating Patients With Cancer Upper Aerodigestive Tract
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine efficacy immunonutrition ( IMPACT® ) patient de novo cancer upper aerodigestive tract . Secondary - Determine best time initiate treatment . - Compare intermediate duration treatment . - Compare nutritional parameter . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients randomize 1 3 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive standard oral enteral nutrition ( IMPACT® placebo ) 7 day prior surgery 7 day surgery . - Arm II : Patients receive oral enteral neoadjuvant IMPACT® nutrition 7 day prior surgery enteral adjuvant standard nutrition ( IMPACT® placebo ) 7 day surgery . - Arm III : Patients receive oral enteral IMPACT® nutrition 7 day prior surgery enteral adjuvant IMPACT® nutrition 7 day surgery . After completion study therapy , patient follow 30 day surgery 2 3 month .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis de novo cancer upper aerodigestive tract , include follow : Oral cavity Larynx Oropharynx Hypopharynx Planned surgical excision tumor open mucous membrane , without immediate reconstruction myocutaneous pedicle flap freebone graft Planned adjuvant enteral nutritional regimen last least 7 day postoperatively PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : ANC > 1.8 x 10^9/L Hemoglobin > 9 g/dL Transaminases ≤ 3 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) Bilirubin ≤ 3 time ULN Creatinine 70250 μmol/L Urea ≤ 1.5 time ULN Glucose < 1.5 g/L Sodium < 145 mmol/L Not pregnant nursing Fertile patient must use effective contraception No psychological , social , geographical , familial reason prohibit followup No insulindependent diabetes No severe psychiatric illness PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : No head neck surgery cancer within past year No prior oral component immunonutrition No prior neoadjuvant chemotherapy No prior radiotherapy head neck
